entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A teacher and headmaster of Hogwarts, whose body is suspected to be lying on the ground.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who is accompanying Harry.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Hagrid's dog, which is following him and Harry.

entities.name: hogwarts castle front doors
entities.description: The entrance to the Hogwarts school.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who are fleeing into the night.

relationships.description: Harry suspects that Dumbledore's body is lying on the ground.
Hagrid and Harry are approaching the castle front, where Death Eaters have fled into the night.
